subject: Labor and Jobs
Lockouts
Collective Bargaining
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: As formal negotiations have broken off, the N.H.L. Players’ Association is trying an unusual legal gambit to block team owners from locking out players in Quebec and Alberta.
snippet: As formal negotiations have broken off, the N.H.L. Players’ Association is trying an unusual legal gambit to block team owners from locking out players in Quebec and Alberta.
